attributes.title: absolutely horrid.
attributes.review: The minute I downloaded the app, my phone started glitching and at one point even crashed for about an hour. When It turned on again i would get virus warnings and could hear a strange buzzing sound through my speakers, my sister told me someone might be listening through my phone and after deleting the app the buzzing stopped. DO NOT GET THIS APP!!!

attributes.title: July 23
attributes.review:
You're insecure,
Don't know what for,
You're turning heads when you walk through the door,
Don't need make-up,
To cover up,
Being the way that you are is enough,

Everyone else in the room can see it,
Everyone else but you

Baby you light up my world like nobody else,

But when you smile at the ground it ain't hard to tell,
You don't know,
Oh, oh,
You don't know you're beautiful,
If only you saw what I can see,
You'd understand why I want you so desperately,
Right now I'm looking at you and I can't believe,
You don't know,
Oh, oh,
You don't know you're beautiful,
Oh, oh,
That's what makes you beautiful

attributes.title: Made my phone crash
attributes.review: Prior to downloading this app my phone displayed an error message. I went to the Apple store and had to get a new phone. I downloaded the app again and the same thing happened. I‚Äôm now on my third iPhone this week and I will not let anyone else I know download this app. Extremely disappointed. I expected better from Trump.

attributes.title: The Worst App to Exist
attributes.review: I was just hoping to get some useful information about my beloved president but it took me 24+ hours to download and then it kept sending me notifications every time Trump had a bowel movement, when I was looking for more information geared toward the president and his 2020 campaign. Very disappointed. This may be enough for him to lose my previously unwavering support.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: It took days to download and then my phone crashed. Just for me to have to redownload it then it refused to let me in the app when i tried to use my already used phone number but then said it was already used when I tried to reregister. Everything was slow and it put my phone down. Would rate 0 stars if i could.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS

It was red and an evil blue. I had to look at our manny flag to feel safe again. DO NOT download this app! Please.

attributes.title: my phone smelled bad after downloading this app!
attributes.review: the app took about 3 days to download and when it finally downloaded horrible smelling green gas poured out of my phone speakers, and i heard trumps voice echoing china!!!! my phone started to shut down randomly all the time and my battery was drained really fast and the smell didn‚Äôt go away. i couldn‚Äôt get rid of the app and it would also get really hot! i decided to go to tiktok which is apparently being deleted from the app store (i didn‚Äôt  have it downloaded) and the minute i opened it my phone went back to normal!!! please dont download this app and download tiktok !!! leave tiktok a 5 star review
